about_the_game:
Masefeh, which means distance in Arabic, is an immersive amalgamation of real-life events, puzzle mechanics, cassette recordings, and graphical expression.
This game is currently an ongoing work in progress. It will contain:
  • Numerous puzzle levels which each explore the unique audio-tape mechanic central to the game.
  • Digitized cassette tape recordings of the actual people involved in the story and their actual lives.
  • Beautifully abstract and colorful visuals
  • Charming audio design
  • Atmospheric music

short_description: Recover an inter-generational story of migration told through real audio recordings of a Lebanese family coming to America in the early 1990's. Maneuver a forgotten strip of audio tape through puzzling landscapes to piece together the voices of the past.
